text: 10:12 Kolosi 3:1; Hibru 1:310:12-13 Onger Akaba 110:1Ezɨ Krais arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa uabɨ uan mɨkarzim dughiar vamɨran a isa ofan mɨn God ganɨngi. An ofan kamɨn gavgavim ikɨvɨra ikɨ ingar mangɨvɨra ikiam. A kamaghɨn amigha gɨvagha, Godɨn agharir guvimɨn amadaghan aperaghav ikia mamaghɨra iti.
